meanings.definition: To express in a formula or systematic method.
meanings.sent1: She formulized her study notes to make them easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The scientist formulized the experiment procedure for accurate results.
meanings.sent3: The teacher formulized the math lesson, making it fun and engaging for the students.
meanings.sent4: He formulized his daily routine, turning it into a well-organized plan.
meanings.sent5: The chef formulized the recipe, ensuring perfect consistency in every dish.

meanings.definition: To make into a formula or system.
meanings.sent1: The company formulized their sales strategy to increase profits.
meanings.sent2: They formulized the new software development process for efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The team formulized their game plan, ready to win the championship.
meanings.sent4: She formulized her skincare routine, achieving clear and healthy skin.
meanings.sent5: The architect formulized the building design, creating a masterpiece of modern architecture.
